Activity: Arrive at the office, log in to the computer, and check emails.
Review emails and address any questions regarding the abstracted data audit report.

Meet with @Clinlead-1, @ITPM-1, @DA-1, @MRS-1, and @HIS-1 to discuss the abstracted data audit report. Finalize the corrective actions to be implemented based on the audit findings. Topic: Discussion and Action Planning for Data Audit Report

Work with @Trainer-1 to develop a training plan for medical records staff to address the identified data abstraction errors. Include training on data entry procedures, documentation requirements, and the importance of data accuracy. Topic: Training plan for medical record staff
Review and update the data abstraction guidelines based on the audit findings and the agreed-upon corrective actions. Clarify any ambiguities or inconsistencies in the guidelines.
Follow up with @EHRDEV-1 and @EHRDEV-2 to ensure that any necessary system modifications are implemented to prevent future data errors.
Plan for the next week's tasks, focusing on the continuous monitoring of data quality and the implementation of the corrective actions from this week's audit.
Document all tasks completed this week, lessons learned, and recommendations for future data quality improvement efforts.
Catch up on industry news related to healthcare data quality and EHR systems.
Finalize and submit the weekly progress report to @ITPM-1.
